value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Explore the capabilities of Power Platform applications, as seen in demonstrations and customer case studies.

value.title: Facilitate collaboration and sharing
value.excerpt: Learn how to collaborate and share dashboards and reports with coworkers.

value.title: Provision Premium capacity in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn about the differences between Power BI Pro and Power BI Premium, and how Power BI Premium manages capacity resources.

value.title: Broaden the reach of Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn the various ways to share Power BI reports beyond your Power BI tenant.

value.title: Introduction to Power BI embedded analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how developers can programmatically embed analytics in their apps, and about no-code embedding options for simpler requirements.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Create a Power BI Dashboard in 10 Minutes!
value.excerpt: Enjoy my free full course on Udemy https://www.udemy.com/share/102Qqu/ Learn how to quickly create your first dashboard using Microsoft Power BI fast. This tutorial will teach you how to load, transform and visualize data with ease.  Contact me on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland

value.title: Cumulative Distribution Plot in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to create cumulative distribution plot which is a great alternative to a histogram. Histogram can lead to binning bias that will provide different distribution of the same data.

value.title: Decision Tree Classifier - Machine Learning in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a machine learning decision tree classifier in Power BI with some simple code. In the tutorial you will learn how to modify and visualize the model output so that you get the best results  This will be achieved with simple Python code. value.title: Avoid filtering issues in Power Query

value.title: Connect to a power bi model in the service using DAX Studio
value.excerpt: You asked me to make a video when it was possible to connect power bi service to DAX Studio, so here it is :)  Two big "but"... 1. It works only with Power BI Premium 2. Read-only for now.  And here is the URL to connect: powerbi://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/workspacename  How about you let us know how

value.title: Create a bump or slope chart in Power BI -D70
value.excerpt: Bump or slope charts are useful to sport changes between categories. There is no native bump or slope visual in Power BI, but you can create your own easily from a line chart. In this video I show you how. #curbal #power bi #bumpcharts  Here you can download the file (#70) here: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
